posts.post_content: Made nice deals with Frank, Todd, and two Dougs. Thanks, gentlemen. Still have these five cards left for trade. I know they are pretty rough but I am looking for comparable commons that I need.  If yours are nicer maybe we can do 2 for 1.  I am only up to about 190 in the monster count so there are lots of commons I need.  Any interest?

Made another trade. Only the Dorner remains available. Anyone? 
Anyone? Bueller?
